titleStmt.title: The Rise & fall of the late eminent and powerful favorite of Spain, the Count Olivares ; the unparallel'd imposture of Michael de Molina, executed at Madrid in the year 1641 ; the right and title of the present Kind of Portugall Don John the fourth, with the most memorable passages of his reign unto the year 1644 translated out of the Italian, Spanish, and Portuguese by Edw. Chamberlayne ...
titleStmt.author: Chamberlayne, Edward, 1616-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for Thomas Heath ...,

notesStmt.note: Each part has special t.p., and continuous paging.
